title: Paris Hilton's Halloween do saw Kim Kardashian's BFF go full Xena
text:
Larsa Pippen slinks into Paris Hilton’s Halloween party wearing Xena-style costume (Picture: Mega)

Just when you thought Xena’s trademark outfit couldn’t get any more racy, Kim Kardashian’s bestie Larsa Pippen rocked up to Paris Hilton’s Halloween party to help you think otherwise.

The 45-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star attended the annual Halloween bash on Thursday evening dressed in a gold bra and matching loincloth, held together with an intricate combination of black straps.

And can we just say – she looks absolutely incredible.

She accessorised her outfit with thigh-high strappy heels, gold shoulder armour, a gold choker, and a killer medieval hairdo to match.

That is an outfit (Picture: Mega)

Let’s hope she didn’t have any wardrobe malfunctions throughout the night.

Larsa posted a series of videos to her Instagram story showing pal and Aussie model Shanina Shaik dropping it down on the dance floor with hostess, Paris (who got her costume from a place literally called Trashy Lingerie).

Oh to be a fly on the wall at *that* Halloween party (Picture: Mega)

Another video features the girls, joined by Sports Illustrated model Jasmine Sanders laughing, pouting and hugging each other while dancing.

Larsa Pippen is one of Kim Kardashian’s best friends, who manages her own beauty/lifestyle magazine, Life With Larsa.

The Assyrian-Lebanese model also had a stint on the Real Housewives Of Miami.

However, she’s best known for being married to basketball player Scottie Pippen whom she has four children with.

And more recently – for spilling the tea on Jordyn Woods and Tristan Thompson.
